properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.encode
properties.description: default encode for nacos config content.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.prefix
properties.description: the prefix of dataId, nacos config data meta info. dataId = prefix + '-' + ${spring.active.profile} + `-` + ${spring.cloud.nacos.config.content-type}.

properties.name: spring.cloud.nacos.config.content-type
properties.description: the content type of nacos config content, only support properties now.
